subject: Require Core Java with Junit
msgSnippet: Hi , We have an immediate requirement for Core java professionals with Junit( is a must ). ... The requirement is as mentioned below. Position Developer -
messageBody:
Hi ,

We have an immediate requirement for Core java professionals with
Junit( is a must ).


----------------------------------------------------------------------

The requirement is as mentioned below.
Position Developer - Offshore
Expereience 2-4yrs
Job Description  Good knowledge in OOAD and design pattern,
expertise in Rationalrose.
Should be able to understand the design and start coding, Understand
Architecture. Experience in SFA, CRM applications would be the best
fit.
Primary skills  Very strong in Core Java, JSP, Servlets, EJB, XML,
Websphere or Weblogic, Junit test tools (Unit testing)
Secondary skills  XSD,Struts, Knowledge in CRM applications
preferred Database  Oracle / SQL,DB2

----------------------------------------------------------------------


PLease send us your detailed resume with full contact details.

Thanks and Regards
Venkat
Senior Consultant
Placements IT
Bangalore
